name: The Secret World of Arrietty
tagline: The Clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. Life changes for the Clocks when their daughter, Arrietty, is discovered.

name: Martin Lawrence Live: Runteldat
tagline: After undergoing a number of personal crises, a stand-up comic returns to the stage for a one-man show featuring stinging social commentary and very personal reflections about his life.

name: Beerfest
tagline: Two brothers travel to Germany for Oktoberfest, only to stumble upon a secret, centuries-old competition described as a "Fight Club" with beer games.

name: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood
tagline: Years after Tommy Jarvis chained him underwater at Camp Crystal Lake, the hulking killer Jason Voorhees returns to the camp grounds when he is released accidentally by a teenager with psychic powers.

name: Jonas Brothers: The 3D Concert Experience
tagline: A 3-D concert film of the 2008 Jonas Brothers "Burning Up" concert tour, as well as documentary footage on the lives of the three brothers.

name: Tuck Everlasting
tagline: A young woman meets and falls in love with a young man who is part of a family of immortals.

name: My Best Friend's Girl
tagline: Tank faces the ultimate test of friendship when his best friend hires him to take his ex-girlfriend out on a lousy date in order to make her realize how great her former boyfriend is.

name: Mother
tagline: A neurotic, twice divorced sci-fi writer moves back in with his mom to solve his personal problems.

name: Man of the House
tagline: A Texas Ranger must protect a group of cheerleaders who have witnessed a murder.

name: Friday the 13th Part 2
tagline: Mrs. Voorhees is dead, and Camp Crystal Lake is shut down, but a camp next to the infamous place is stalked by an unknown assailant. Is it Mrs. Voorhees' son Jason who didn't drown in the lake some 30 years before?

name: Hart's War
tagline: A law student becomes a lieutenant during World War II, is captured and asked to defend a black prisoner of war falsely accused of murder.

name: Johnny Mnemonic
tagline: A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.

name: Waitress
tagline: Jenna is a pregnant, unhappily married waitress in the deep south. She meets a newcomer to her town and falls into an unlikely relationship as a last attempt at happiness.

name: I, Frankenstein
tagline: Frankenstein's creature finds himself caught in an all-out, centuries old war between two immortal clans.

name: Remember Me
tagline: A romantic drama centered on two new lovers: Tyler, whose parents have split in the wake of his brother's suicide, and Ally, who lives each day to the fullest since witnessing her mother's murder.

name: The Impossible
tagline: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

name: Rollerball
tagline: The big thing in 2005 is a violent sport which can have some pretty serious consequences... like dying.

name: Vacancy
tagline: A young married couple becomes stranded at an isolated motel and finds hidden video cameras in their room. They realize that unless they escape, they'll be the next victims of a snuff film

name: The Octagon
tagline: A martial artist must defeat a plan by ninjas to create a worldwide training camp for terrorists.

name: The Replacement Killers
tagline: Failing to kill anymore because of his conscience, a troubled hit-man seeks aid from a forger to help him get papers to China. However, the drug-lord has hired replacements to finish the job and kill the hit-man.

name: Jason Lives: Friday the 13th Part VI
tagline: Tommy Jarvis goes to the graveyard to get rid of Jason Voorhees' body, but he accidentally brings him back to life. Jason wants revenge and Tommy must defeat him once and for all!

name: Two Brothers
tagline: Two tigers are separated as cubs and taken into captivity, only to be reunited years later as enemies by an explorer (Pearce) who inadvertently forces them to fight each other.

name: Haywire
tagline: A black ops super soldier seeks payback after she is betrayed and set up during a mission.

name: Cocoon: The Return
tagline: The old age pensioners that left at the end of the first film come back to earth to visit their relatives. Will they all decide to go back to the planet where no-one grows old, or will they be tempted to stay back on earth?

name: Untamed Heart
tagline: Girl meets boy. They fall in love. Tragedy strikes.

name: The Odd Couple II
tagline: Oscar and Felix take a road trip to their son and daughter's wedding.

name: Shark Night 3D
tagline: A weekend at a lake house in the Louisiana Gulf turns into a nightmare for seven vacationers as they are subjected to shark attacks.

name: The Marine
tagline: A group of diamond thieves on the run kidnap the wife of a recently discharged marine who goes on a chase through the South Carolinian wilderness to retrieve her.

name: Dunston Checks In
tagline: Young boy befriends larcenous orangutan in luxury hotel.

name: The Legend of Hercules
tagline: The origin story of the the mythical Greek hero. Betrayed by his stepfather, the King, and exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.

name: Akeelah and the Bee
tagline: A young girl from South Los Angeles tries to make it to the National Spelling Bee.

name: Across the Great Divide
castlist: The Indian People of Utah and Canada

name: Macon County Line
tagline: A vengeful Southern sheriff is out for blood after his wife is brutally killed by a pair of drifters. Low-budget film set in Georgia in 1953 and based on fact.

name: The Upside of Anger
tagline: When her husband unexpectedly disappears, a sharp-witted suburban wife and her daughters juggle their mom's romantic dilemmas and family dynamics.

name: The Believers
tagline: A New York psychiatrist finds that a voodoo cult, which believes in child sacrifice, has a keen interest in his own son.

name: Year of the Dragon
tagline: A racist Vietnam vet becomes a New York cop and cracks down on organized crime in Chinatown.

name: Casualties of War
tagline: During the Vietnam War, a soldier finds himself the outsider of his own squad when they unnecessarily kidnap a female villager.

name: Becoming Jane
tagline: A biographical portrait of a pre-fame Jane Austen and her romance with a young Irishman.

name: The Ninth Gate
tagline: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones.

name: Anywhere But Here
tagline: A mother and daughter search for success in Beverly Hills.

name: Michael Jordan to the Max
tagline: Michael Jordan Is Praised as the Greatest Basketball Player of All Time in This Documentary!

name: The Quick and the Dead
tagline: Lady avenger returns to western town owned by a ruthless gunslinger hosting an elimination tournament.

name: Best in Show
tagline: A colorful array of characters competes at a national dog show.

name: Man on a Ledge
tagline: As a police psychologist works to talk down an ex-con who is threatening to jump from a Manhattan hotel rooftop, the biggest diamond heist ever committed is in motion.

name: Blame It on Rio
tagline: Best friends and their daughters holiday in Rio only for one to fall for the other's daughter.

name: Aquamarine
tagline: Two teenage girls discover a mermaid in their beach club's swimming pool.

name: Frost/Nixon
tagline: A dramatic retelling of the post-Watergate television interviews between British talk-show host David Frost and former president Richard Nixon.

name: Prancer
tagline: A farm girl nurses a wounded reindeer she believes is one of Santa's, hoping to bring it back to health in time for Christmas. Her holiday spirit inspires those around her, something her disheartened father is having trouble understanding.

name: The Fan
tagline: An all star baseball player becomes the unhealthy focus of a down on his luck salesman.

name: Flight of the Navigator
tagline: In 1978, a boy is moved 8 years into the future and has an adventure with the alien ship that is responsible for that.

name: Ultraviolet
tagline: A beautiful hemophage infected with a virus that gives her superhuman powers has to protect a boy in a futuristic world, who is thought to be carrying antigens that would destroy all hemophages.

name: Super Troopers
tagline: Five Vermont state troopers, avid pranksters with a knack for screwing up, try to save their jobs and out-do the local police department by solving a crime.

name: You're Next
tagline: When the Davison family comes under attack during their wedding anniversary getaway, the gang of mysterious killers soon learns that one of victims harbors a secret talent for fighting back.

name: Singles
tagline: A group of twenty-something friends, most of whom live in the same apartment complex, search for love and success in grunge-era Seattle.

name: Into the Blue
tagline: A group of divers find themselves in deep trouble with a drug lord after they come upon the illicit cargo of a sunken airplane.

name: The Invention of Lying
tagline: A comedy set in a world where no one has ever lied, until a writer seizes the opportunity for personal gain.

name: A Thousand Words
tagline: After stretching the truth on a deal with a spiritual guru, literary agent Jack McCall finds a Bodhi tree on his property. Its appearance holds a valuable lesson on the consequences of every word we speak.

name: Quartet
tagline: At a home for retired musicians, the annual concert to celebrate Verdi's birthday is disrupted by the arrival of Jean, an eternal diva and the former wife of one of the residents.

name: Thrill Ride: The Science of Fun
Into the Wild
tagline: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

name: 127 Hours
tagline: A mountain climber becomes trapped under a boulder while canyoneering alone near Moab, Utah and resorts to desperate measures in order to survive.

name: Good Guys Wear Black
tagline: An ex-US Army commando must find the reason why his comrades from his unit are being systematically murdered before he is next.

name: North Country
tagline: A fictionalized account of the first major successful sexual harassment case in the United States -- Jenson vs. Eveleth Mines, where a woman who endured a range of abuse while working as a miner filed and won the landmark 1984 lawsuit.

name: Babe: Pig in the City
tagline: Babe, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest, returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, but after Farmer Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe has to go to the big city to save the farm.

name: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
tagline: Singer Dewey Cox overcomes adversity to become a musical legend.

name: The Four Feathers
tagline: A British officer resigns his post just before battle and subsequently receives four white feathers from his friends and fiancee as symbols of what they believe to be his cowardice.

name: Fright Night
tagline: A teenager suspects that his new neighbor is a vampire.

name: Posse
tagline: A group of mostly black infantrymen return from the Spanish-American War with a cache of gold. They travel to the West where their leader searches for the men who lynched his father.

name: Crimes and Misdemeanors

production.name: Jack Rollins & Charles H. Joffe Productions

tagline: An opthamologist's mistress threatens to reveal their affair to his wife, while a married documentary filmmaker is infatuated by another woman.

name: Simon Birch
tagline: A young boy with stunted growth is convinced that God has a great purpose for him.

name: That Darn Cat
tagline: A maid is kidnapped and scratches a message onto D.C. the cat's collar and when his owner Patti discovers this, she plays amateur detective with the help of D.C. to try to find the culprits.

name: Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle
tagline: An Asian-American office worker and his Indian-American stoner friend embark on a quest to satisfy their desire for White Castle burgers.

name: The Last Castle
tagline: A court-martialed general rallies together 1200 inmates to rise against the corrupt system that put him away.

name: The Sure Thing
tagline: A college student plans a cross-country trip to get laid, but ends up traveling with a young woman. They hate each other, so naturally...

name: Last Man Standing
tagline: A drifting gunslinger-for-hire finds himself in the middle of an ongoing war between the Irish and Italian mafia in a Prohibition era ghost town.

name: DuckTales the Movie: Treasure of the Lost Lamp
tagline: Scrooge McDuck searches for a magic lamp that holds a genie. But an evil wizard is after it too.

name: Chernobyl Diaries
tagline: Six tourists hire an extreme tour guide who takes them to the abandoned city Pripyat, the former home to the workers of the Chernobyl nuclear reactor. During their exploration, they soon discover they are not alone.

name: New Nightmare
tagline: A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?
